name: United States Meat Export Federation
goal: USMEF is a not for profit trade federation that seeks to help US farmers and companies export beef, pork and lamb around the world.
interests: Agriculture, Customs, Environment, Food Safety, Trade
euInitiatives:
EU Market access for US red meats
EU regulations on meat production practises and the use of new technologies
Animal welfare
EU agricultural policy
EU trade agreements with third countries
